title: X-ACTO Pencil Sharpener, XLR Electric Pencil Sharpener, Colored Pencil Sharpener for Artists, Powerful, Compact Small Pencil Sharpener, Black, 1 Count
description: Spend less time sharpening and more time writing with the break-resistant X-ACTO XLR Pencil Sharpener. With the Pencil Saver feature, this electric pencil sharpener prevents over-sharpening to keep tips from breaking and frustration from setting in. A slip-resistant bottom keeps the pencil sharpener steady when in use. Finally, the SafeStart electric motor stops when the easy-to-empty shavings bin is removed. It’s also compatible with colored pencils. Stay sharp with X-ACTO, the #1 electric pencil sharpener brand!
